update sysmenu set Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ParentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Iconic = #{iconic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, State = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreatePerson = #{createperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdatePerson = #{updateperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsLeaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TabId = #{tabid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CascadeId = #{cascadeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ParentName = #{parentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select distinct t0.* from SysMenu t0 inner join SysMenuSysRoleSysOperation t1 on t0.Id=t1.SysMenuId where t1.SysRoleId in (select t1.SysRoleId from SysPerson t0 inner join SysRoleSysPerson t1 on t0.Id=t1.SysPersonId where t0.Id=#{id} ) and t1.SysOperationId is null order by t0.sort,t0.Remark
